.. _soundAPI:

:mod:`psychopy.sound` - for playback and recording of sound
===========================================================

.. currentmodule:: psychopy.sound

The `psychopy.sound` module provides an interface for audio playback and
recording devices. It also provides tools for working with audio samples and
performing speech-to-text transcription.
